contributions: Minguet é Irol, Pablo, d. 1801?, engraver.
Jay I. Kislak Collection (Library of Congress)
title: Ordenanzas del Consejo Real de las Indias
subjects: Spain -- Colonies -- America -- Early works to 1800
by_statement: nuevamente recopiladas, y por el rey D. Phelipe IV. N.S. para su govierno, establecidas año de M.DC.XXXVI.

notes.value:
Laws and ordinances relating to the New World and the treatment of Native Americans.

A reimpression of the 1681 edition published in Madrid, Por Iulian de Paredes. Originally published: Madrid, Por la viuda de Iuan Gonçalez, 1636.

Signatures: A-Cc⁴ Dd⁶.

Royal arms engraved on t.p. with legend: Plus ultra. Engraving signed: Pau[lu]s Minguet, fec[i]t M[adrid] 1747. Decorative frame differs from that in original edition.

Title and text printed within double ruled borders.

Woodcut initials, tail piece.

"Indice de los autos, acuerdos, y decretos de govierno del Consejo Real de las Indias," [12] p. at end.

LC Copy 2 has certificates of authenticity in ms., mounted at end, bearing the stamps of the Ministerio de Gracia y Justicia and of the Legation of the United States of America [in] Spain. The latter includes the autograph signature of American envoy extraordinary Daniel M. Barringer. Acquired by transfer in 1925.

Leclerc, C.  Bib. Americana, item 422

Palau y Dulcet, vol. 11, p. 434, item 202820

Sabin, vol. 14, p. 35, item 57477
